name: Sample Case 10: Post-Bankruptcy Reporting Violation
description: A debt discharged in bankruptcy that is still being reported with an active balance.
raw_text:
CREDIT CARDS

Creditor: BIG BOX FINANCE
Account Type: Revolving
Status: Discharged in Bankruptcy

Balance: $4,821
Credit Limit: $5,000
Date Closed: 11/10/2023

Remarks: CHAPTER 7 DISCHARGE; INCLUDED IN BANKRUPTCY
notes: Triggers BK1 because a discharged debt must report a $0 balance. Triggers D1 because 'Discharged' status is inconsistent with a $4,821 balance.
